.. _create_delaunayNetwork_deldir:
``create_delaunayNetwork_deldir``
=====================================

create_delaunayNetwork_deldir

Description
-----------

Create a spatial Delaunay network with deldir

Usage
-----

.. code-block:: r

   create_delaunayNetwork_deldir(
     spatial_locations,
     sdimx = "sdimx",
     sdimy = "sdimy",
     ...
   )
